constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 83 (Thursday, May 13, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ARMSTRONG:
H.R. 3177.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 3 ``to regulate commerce with
foreign nationa, and among the several states, and with the
Indian tribes;''
[Page H2315]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

title: Safe Driving Vehicles Act
